text: Imagine a vast sheet of paper on which straight Lines, Triangles, Squares, Pentagons, Hexagons, and other figures, instead of remaining fixed in their places, move freely about, on or in the surface, but without the power of above or sinking below it, very much like shadows only hard and with luminous edges and you will then have a pretty correct notion of my country and countrymen. Alas, a few years ago, I should have said universe but now my mind has been opened to higher views of Imagine a vast sheet of paper on which straight Triangles, Squares, Hexagons, and other figures, instead of fixed in their move freely about on the surface but without above it much like shadows only hard and with luminous edges and you then have a pretty correct notion of my countrymen.
